logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Bug 42050 - proxying does not work. Adding proxyTransformer that is doing the proxy rewritte as last step of the transformation for html documents. Adding chaperon pattern resolver and using it for css proxing. Can scan any file for pattern and transform them to links, see the way I implemented in css to extend it to e.g. js. Extending PublicationConfiguration.java and publication.rng to read and allow the new attributes in the proxies element.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removed proxy and context path handling from UuidToUrlTransformer. This is now handled either by the ProxyTransformer, or by the BaseUrlModule (if no transformation can be applied). All references to the BaseUrlModule have been removed to avoid duplicate application of the context path.
